scripts.build: echo 'Build started' && ls -la && pwd && echo 'Checking flower-shop...' && ls -la flower-shop/ && echo 'Build completed'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing...' && ls -la && pwd && echo 'flower-shop exists:' && ls -la flower-shop/ || echo 'flower-shop NOT found'
scripts.install-deps: echo 'Installing dependencies...' && cd flower-shop && echo 'Dependencies installed'
